alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County; North Snowy Range Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: High Wind Watch issued November 14 at 1:14PM MST until November 16 at 2:00PM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY EVENING THROUGH THURSDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...West winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 70 mph possible. * WHERE...Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County and North Snowy Range Foothills. * WHEN...From Wednesday evening through Thursday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Mainly to transportation. Strong cross winds will be hazardous to light weight or high profile vehicles, including those towing campers and light loaded tractor trailers. Blow off and blow over risks will be elevated to extreme.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County; North Snowy Range Foothills
